title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to talk with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter that adds Ollama models as first-class LLM and embeddings providers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with history, tab-completion and markdown rendering for Ollama chats.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG stack using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that forwards messages to a local Ollama instance and streams answers back.

title: ollama4j
summary: Lightweight Java client/SDK for Ollama with Spring Boot starter and fluent API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with NuGet package and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel service provider wrapping the Ollama REST API with facades and artisan commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered apps.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings to the Ollama local server.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package exposing sync & async Pythonic APIs for chatting and embedding with Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models to servers with slash commands, threads and mod tools.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama using reqwest and serde.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat UI that talks to Ollama with session memory and markdown rendering.
